title: qqwx
author: qqwx
content: DeFi is complicated with more than 17k options and steep learning curves. Millions of users are left out of participating. Hedgepie connects those interested in DeFi opportunities with those supplying DeFi opportunities - making previously fragmented options transparent in one user-friendly platform.HedgePie is a community-driven decentralized network of investors and crypto enthusiasts from all over the world.Stay on top of the action with the latest news and important announcements on our social media channels. Need some information or have a question? Contact us at support@hedgepie.finance or techsupport@hedgepie.finance and our team will be in touch soon.

comments.author: qqwx
comments.body: Here is support mail - support@hedgepie.finance or techsupport@hedgepie.finance
